Text: This was a very disturbing book to read.  Thank you for uploading the ePub version for us.  This is a great book, and my daughters teacher used it in class.

Hey Smartass...  Thanks for taking the time to check it out...  It's a bit horrific what happened...  and what's even more horrific, is that it has happened over and over for years, and is probably about to happen again...  

Keep up the reading... keep educating yourself!
